thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump Tariff Plan Lifts Gold, Nudges Global Aluminum

author: David Hodari
title: Trump Tariff Plan Lifts Gold, Nudges Global Aluminum
text:
LONDON—The price of aluminum fell and gold rose Friday in the wake of President Donald Trump’s announcement of steel and aluminum tariffs.
News of Mr. Trump’s plan sent the premium that investors pay for aluminum in the U.S. over a global price soaring by as high as $375 a ton, a three-year high, amid the prospect of fresh levies on 90% of the nation’s supply of this metal.
Still,...
